subject: Child Abuse and Neglect
Sex Crimes
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Seven women and five men on the main panel and four alternates were selected in a courthouse in Bellefonte, Pa., for Jerry Sandusky’s child sexual abuse trial.
snippet: Seven women and five men on the main panel and four alternates were selected in a courthouse in Bellefonte, Pa., for Jerry Sandusky’s child sexual abuse trial.
